titleStmt.title: The ultimum vale, or, Last farevvell of Thomas Earle of Strafford. Written by himselfe a little before his death.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Farewell vain world, farewell my fleeting joyes ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
